A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie makes the prequels seem like Oscar winners. Jar jar binks was a better character than these shallow characters forced upon us. Good space fights give it the only positive. After waiting 30 years for Luke to be the ultimate Jedi I left the movie feeling betrayed and like something was stolen from me. I will not see episode 9 or any other \"star wars stories\"  ever again.
